about.subtitle: 25+ Years of Excellence
about.text1: Simmons Civil Group Inc has been providing top-quality construction and utility services for over 25 years. Our commitment to excellence, safety, and client satisfaction sets us apart in the industry!
about.text2: We pride ourselves on building lasting relationships with our clients through reliable service, quality workmanship, and attention to detail on every project.
